transcript: I mean, I feel like my whole life is gonna be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands Classed expectingly waiting for the fish to show up and the fish won't show up

segments.text: I mean, I feel like my whole life is gonna be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands
Classed expectingly waiting for the fish to show up and the fish won't show up

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, I feel like my whole life is gonna be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.  And the fish won't show up.
